title: Bug 49956@Resource(name=) Normalization of JNDI Name
description: Created attachment 26048 [details]Resolves issuename attribute of @Resource defines JNDI name of the resource that binds the resource to web component java:comp/env/.java:comp/env/bla..bla.. could be given as a JNDI name. Therefore before using name in DefaultInstanceManager to inject fields & methods, it must be normalized.For example,@Resource(name="java:comp/env/myDataSource")DataSource ds;Before looking up "context.lookup(name)" in DefaultInstanceManager, we have to normalize name to "myDataSource".Patch is attached
